results.name: Aim Body
results.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

effect.name: Ignore Damage Reduction
effect.description: Ignores damage reduction effects

results.name: Aim Weak Spot
results.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Leaves the Branding Effect for 2 turns if the target has higher MAX HP than that of yours.

effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

effect.name: Brand
effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

results.name: Hawk's Eye (Passive)
results.description: Inflicts damage that ignores the target's Defense with a 20% chance with every attack. The chance increases by 15% for every harmful effect granted on the target, up to 50%. [Automatic Effect]

effect.name: Ignore DEF
effect.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

effects.note: Chance increases 5% per harmful effect on target

results.name: Master of Hunting (Passive)
results.description: Weakens the enemy's Defense for 1 turn if you attack the enemy with no beneficial effects and freezes the enemy for 1 turn if you attack the enemy under a harmful effect. [Automatic Effect]

effect.name: Freeze
effect.description: Enemy is frozen and immobilized for a number of turns

effect.name: Decrease DEF
effect.description: Defense is reduced by 70%

effects.note: If target not under harmful effect

results.name: Destruction Wedge
results.description: Attacks the enemy with an arrow that can't be removed and removes all beneficial effects granted on the enemy, weakens Defense for 2 turns and increases the chances of landing a glancing hit for 2 turns with a 90% chance each. In addition, increases your Attack Bar by 50% if you attack with a Critical Hit.

effect.name: Remove Buff
effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

effect.name: Decrease DEF
effect.description: Defense is reduced by 70%

effect.name: Glancing Hit
effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

effect.name: Increase ATB
effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

results.name: Silver Light
results.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with arrows of light. The faster your Attack Speed compared to the enemy's, the greater damage you can inflict.

results.name: Desperate Arrow
results.description: Consumes half of your current HP to inflict damage that ignores the enemy's Defense. If your HP is full when it's your turn, [Desperate Arrow] cooldown time will reset.

results.description: Shoots 2 precise shots that are aimed for the enemy's weak spots. Each hit has a 25% chance to ignore the enemy's Defense.

results.description: Acquires a shield that equals to 20% of your MAX HP for 2 turns when you're attacked with a Critical Hit. [Automatic Effect]

results.description: Revives a dead ally and balances the target's HP ratio to half of your HP ratio and recovers the target's HP by 15% each turn for 2 turns.
